text: Yaad karo, Israel ki aulad se humne pukhta ahad liya tha ke Allah ke siwa kisi ki ibadat na karna, Maa Baap ke saath, rishtedaaron ke saath, yateemon aur miskeeno ke saath neik sulook karna, logon se bhali baat kehna , Namaz qayam karna aur zakaat dena, magar thode aadmiyon ke siwa tum sab us ahad se phir gaye aur ab tak phirey huey ho
